course.subject: CHEM
course.name: Fundamental Analytical Chemistry Laboratory
course.description: This is the laboratory course corresponding to the lecture courses of CHEM 2310 and CHEM 2311. Experiments covered in this course will be closely connected with the topics covered in the lecture courses, including calibration principle, and some basic optical and chromatographic instrumental techniques. For non-CHEM students in programs that designate this course as required course/specified elective only.
course.prerequisites: (CHEM 1010 OR CHEM 1020) AND CHEM 1050
course.corequisites: CHEM 2310 OR CHEM 2311
course.exclusions: CHEM 2350, CHEM 2555

reviews.author: clm102
reviews.comment_content:
Expt 1: Calibration of Volumetric Glassware

Expt 2: Quantitative Analysis of Xylene Isomer (para-Xylene) Using Fourier Transform-Infrared Spectrometer (FT-IR)

Expt3: Determination of n-Heptane, n-Octane and n-Decane in unknown sample using Gas Chromatograph - Flame Ionization Detector (GC-FID)
reviews.comment_teaching: No teaching at all. I just read lab manual by myself.
reviews.comment_grading:
60% Reports
20% Lab Quizzes
20% Oral Exam

One thing I would like to talk about is the Oral Exam. There was only one question in the oral exam and it was a multiple choice. I chose the wrong answer so it is 0% out of 20% for my oral exam. I lose 20% just because answered ONE multiple choice wrongly haha! My overall percentage is around 71% at last (I calculated myself) and I got B-. Good grade? But I can say the course grading and the final exam arrangement are bad.
reviews.comment_workload: Almost zero workload because you just have to prepare for 3 lab quiz, 3 lab worksheets and the oral quiz.

reviews.author: ka@-@
reviews.title: Online 下 好讀
reviews.comment_content:
內容上同以往相同
只是本來因為需時耐而分拆的Lab，合併番成3個Lab
reviews.comment_teaching:
好仔細 講解 原理、步驟
所有堂都有得在Canvas睇番
reviews.comment_grading:
Lab Quiz :
3 個 Lab 3 個 Quiz
    4 MC for 10 mins
    ONE attempt
    在Lan Manual 搵到 Ans
Oral Quiz
    其實是Exam
    只是oral 形式 有需要可用筆紙輔助
    有 約10個file 自己抽 1 個 答
    限期 3 mins 包括睇題目
    Type of questions:
           Data handling – Calculation, explanatory questions, how?, explain…
          Results – Sketch, plot, symbols,
          abbreviations, equations, explain…
         Theoretical background – Why? Explain ...,
          Practical procedure – How? Why? Describe…

Safety Sheet :
簡單填個名、日期等基本資料
只要小心唔好交錯落另一個Lab

e-Report & Date sheet
格式同以往相同
但更簡單
所有人都係同一set Data
所以可以同人double check
D 格式 好多要求
要留意係小心 係取s.f. 定 decimal number  
有時上堂臨時改 在e-report system 未show 到出來
基本大部分人都 full mark  

分Grade基本在Quiz
其中一個Quiz 錯左一題
Oral Quiz 大約90% 分
最後A-
reviews.comment_workload:
low

Attendance
只有 第一堂Briefing 、Trial session、 Oral Exam 計

e-report
由以往24hr 變成 一星期

reviews.author: Kui
reviews.title: 好grade 但有d煩既course
reviews.comment_content:
得3個labs要做
係biweekly咁做
有時可能1個lab分開a 同b part
唔係好記得係d咩內容
但如果係envs既學生去take的話, 佢d content同envs 3001有d似, 所以會有少少優勢
reviews.comment_teaching:
joanne都會講得清楚
不過做LAB果陣都係問TA多
TA都係好好人 好肯答野
基本上都係靠佢地carry
reviews.comment_grading:
E-report好似都有95%
final quiz就唔清楚...最尾冇時間返去check卷
返去check先知幾分
佢唔會放上canvas
reviews.comment_workload:
e-report煩左d
要24小時內交
每次做完lab之後果24個鐘都有d精神緊張
另外仲有hard copy report, 但都係plot下graph
計下數咁
比較簡單, 係要特別留意d 小數位 同埋d dilution factor

reviews.author: yofung_tw
reviews.comment_content:
Expt1: Calibration of volumetric glassware (pipette & burette)

Expt2: Quantitative analysis of xylene isomer (meta-, para-) using Fourier transform- infrared spectrometer (FT-IR)

Expt3: Determination of n-heptane, n-octane, n-decane in unknown sample using chromatograph - flame ionisation detector (GC-FID)

It is not really the same as CHEM2311 content. I cannot link the two course content together until when it comes to final exam period that i finish all the syllabus of the CHEM2311 lecture.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Pre-lab powerpoint are available on CANVAS.
But you better print it and bring it to the briefing session as there will be "fill in the blank" that you may miss points if you didn't jog notes. Some points may be found in lab manual.
reviews.comment_grading:
20 MC Final exam but different MC have different marks, ranging from 1-4 marks.
Seeing the 4 marks question, you better pay attention to the calculations.

E-report: 50%
FInal: 50%

For me,
those 3 e-reports, 1 got full mark, another two -6, -11
Final 43/46
Got a A-
reviews.comment_workload:
3 Lab, totally 5 sessions.
3 e-report that due 24 hours after lab
As the e-report contribute greatly to the grade, wrong data input or calculations will be detrimental.

Final Exam(20 MC, 1 hour)

reviews.title: CHEM2355
reviews.comment_content:
I have to do the lab before attending the lecture, so I do not really know what I am exactly doing.
i.e. My first lab in February was GCFID but it was taught in April from the lecture.

Total 5 sections (3 lab) - 2 labs are repated
reviews.comment_teaching: Most of the TA prefer to use Cantonese, perhaps some of them have very poorly spoken English
reviews.comment_grading:
50% Lab report (3 reports)
50% Final exam (20 MC - 1 hr)

Everyone gets approximately the same mark for the lab report

I did not know the score of my final exam as I did not go to the paper checking section, as it is in the middle of the final exam period
reviews.comment_workload: Very low, only workload is to fill in 3 lab report and hand-in the hard copy of calibration curve. And follow a lot of strange rules

reviews.author: RR
reviews.title: 輕輕鬆鬆
reviews.comment_content:
雖然呢個 Course 既 abbreviation 叫 Fund Anal Chem Lab, 但唔係玩屎忽既

入正題:
Total 得3次 lab, 1個月做一個

Expt1: calibration of volumetric glassware

Expt2: quantitative analysis of Xylene isomer (meta-, para-) using fourier transform- infrared spectrometer (FT-IR)

Expt3: determination of n-heptane, n-octane, n-decane in unknown sample using Chromatograph - Flame ionization detector (GC-FID)

content 太少, 想學野既朋友可以睇埋佢比既 reading, 但唔好對呢個 course 抱太大期望
reviews.comment_teaching:
MC lab >>>>>>>>>>>>> gen chem lab

Joanne 起每次 briefing 都講得好清楚, 基本上唔洗 pre lab 都得

TAs, Technicians 都好 nice, 有耐心慢慢教你 run 機
reviews.comment_grading:
50% reports (e-reports)

50% final written exam

expt1: 77/77

expt2: 43/53

expt3: 96/100

final: 34/40

overall: A-

mean sd 都唔知, 基本上大家都差唔多分
reviews.comment_workload:
全部lab都好輕鬆, 入到去先pre都OK (靠隊友carry

E-report 一定要起lab入面做, 但時間好充裕
有source既話早1-2個鐘走都不是夢

唔睇 Reading 都唔影響 final exam (算易, 考前先溫都唔太差
